summary: A configuration container that encapsulates all architectural and training hyperparameters required to instantiate a Time Series Transformer model, including forecast horizon, encoder context, feature specifications, scaling options, lag definitions, transformer dimensions, attention settings, dropout rates, initialization, and caching behavior.
business_intent: Allow practitioners to quickly define and customize a transformer‑based time‑series forecasting model by specifying prediction length, context, feature types, and model architecture, facilitating accurate and efficient forecasting across diverse datasets.
